data.eml:eml: A checklist of Polyplacophora (Mollusca) from the Fiji islands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schwabe, Enrico, Sirenko, Boris I., Seeto, Johnson (2008): A checklist of Polyplacophora (Mollusca) from the Fiji islands. Zootaxa 1777: 1-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274284
